attributes.action: not allow large corporate firms to hide behind rhetoric and not act to help disabled staff to develop and feel included.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have discovered that there are several corporate firms which are showing a big interest in making sure that the public and media see that they take corporate responsibilty seriously in relation to diversity and inclusion of staff and the general public. I have found that in many cases the information provided on websites describing what an individual company does to include disabled staff is not applied.
